title: IIMB Notification 2025 - Apply Online for Academic Associate Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Management Bangalore (IIMB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Academic Associate Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Computer Science Engineering, PGDM, and MBA  can apply for the IIMB Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the educatio...
